Text: Re Transfers from EES Cc We have some new hires that are not listed but I assume that HR will handle their transfers Also Christina Bangle and Jay Blaine are leaving the group prior to the transfer date Otherwise the list is complete Jess Hewitt Director Gas Risk Management ENRON ENERGY SERVICES Ph From StubblefieldWadeHOUEES To Lotus NotesBlackDonHOUEES Lotus NotesHerndonRogersHOUECT Lotus NotesHewittJessHOUEES Lotus NotesBresnanNeilHOUEES Lotus NotesJacksonMarkHOUEES Lotus NotesAvsMallikHOUEES Lotus NotesW LewisJamesHOUEES Lotus NotesLynne RufferMaryHOUEES Lotus NotesHongNeilHOUEES Lotus NotesM EgglestonMeredithHOUEES Lotus NotesMillsScottHOUEES cc Lotus NotesColwellWesEnron Lotus NotesBeckSallyEnron Lotus NotesBryantRachelHOUEES Lotus NotesMasseyRachelHOUEES Lotus NotesKillenFaithEnron Lotus NotesApolloBethEnron Subject Transfers from EES Date PM Attached is the latest version of the cost center assignments for the transfers out of EES These transfers will be effective July and I need to get this to HR by Friday June to give them time to get everything effected I think I have incorporated all your comments but please review one more time and make sure we have not included anyone we shouldnt have or excluded anyone Youll note that at this point we are not forming East and West risk management cost centers Don and Rogers have decided for cost management purposes to leave it consolidated at this point Once you have signed off on your groupings Rachel Massey in Corporate Planning will be working with each of you to forecast your Q and Q cost center expense plans Please let me know ASAP of any changes and dont hesitate to call with questions Thanks Wade
Transco Zone Any response on the issue of earlier noms on Transco I dont want to go into the market cover this position if ENA can cover us with early morning noms Let me know Jess

Re Intel Tamco High Plains Ethanol done deal Cc you guys asked me to let you know if we are turning back any customers heres the word from Roger Ponce Forwarded by Jess HewittHOUEES on PM Enron Energy Services From Roger O Ponce PM To Roger ES cc Jess ES Kristann ES Subject Re Intel Tamco High Plains Ethanol done deal They are existing customers and will be contracted on spot paper Also we have sent notices of termination to all month to month customers advsing that a term transaction is necessary for us to continue service Thanks Roger
